## Load data 

```{r}
codes_path <- file.path('..', 'data', 'codes.csv')
degrees_path <- file.path('..', 'data', 'degrees.csv')
quotes_path <- file.path('..', 'data', 'quotes.csv')

codes_df <- readr::read_csv(file = codes_path)
degrees_df <- readr::read_csv(file = degrees_path)
quotes_df <- readr::read_csv(file = quotes_path)
```
